price: (Ey Muhammed!) Sana vahyolunana uy ve Allah hükmünü verinceye kadar sabret. O, hüküm verenlerin en hayırlısıdır.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka wa-iṣ'bir ḥattā yaḥkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
